tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE audit_log (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  user_id INT NOT NULL,
  action VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  details TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE change_log (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  user_id INT NOT NULL,
  table_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  action VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE audit_logs (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    action VARCHAR(50),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    details VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE access_logs (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    resource_id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    action VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE auditing_logs (
    log_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    user_id INT,
    action VARCHAR(50),
    table_name VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE user_activity_logs (
    log_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    user_id INT,
    action VARCHAR(50),
    table_name VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE table_changes (
    change_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    user_id INT,
    action VARCHAR(50),
    table_name VARCHAR(50),
    column_name VARCHAR(50),
    old_value VARCHAR(255),
    new_value VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE database_access_logs (
    log_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    user_id INT,
    action VARCHAR(50),
    database_name VARCHAR(50),
    success BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE session_logs (
    log_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    user_id INT,
    action VARCHAR(50),
    session_id VARCHAR(50),
    duration INT
);
